mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nvecaretemplatehistory (ecare_no, user_id, lastupdate_dt, lastupdate_tm, seg, template, history_msg, tmpl_ver, kakao_buttons, conts_no) VALUES (#{ecareNo}, #{userId}, #{lastupdateDt, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastupdateTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seg}, #{template}, #{historyMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmplVer}, #{kakaoButtons, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contsNo})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM nvecaretemplatehistory a, nvecaremsg b, nvuser c WHERE a.ecare_no = b.ecare_no AND a.user_id = c.user_id

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER(ORDER BY a.lastupdate_dt, a.lastupdate_tm, a.seg) l_rank , row_number() OVER(ORDER BY a.lastupdate_dt DESC, a.lastupdate_tm DESC, a.seg) rnum , coalesce(a.ecare_no,0) ecare_no, a.seg, a.template, coalesce(a.tmpl_ver,0) tmpl_ver, a.lastupdate_dt, a.lastupdate_tm, a.history_msg , b.ecare_nm, b.channel_type, c.name_kor, 0 as handler_ver, '' as appsource FROM nvecaretemplatehistory a, nvecaremsg b, nvuser c WHERE a.ecare_no = b.ecare_no AND a.user_id = c.user_id
ORDER BY a.lastupdate_dt DESC, a.lastupdate_tm DESC ) x WHERE rnum >= ((#{nowPage} - 1) * #{countPerPage} + 1) AND rnum <= #{nowPage} * #{countPerPage}
